        public ActivationNetwork(int inputs,
                 int outputs,
                 int[] neuronsPerHiddenLayer,

        参数:
        inputs - dimension of input vector
        outputs - dimension of output vector
        neuronsPerHiddenLayer - neurons per hidden layer
        actfun - specified activation function
